title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 3028/94 of 13 December 1994 re-establishing the levying of customs duties on products of CN codes ex 7304, 7305 and ex 7306 originating in the Republics of Croatia, Bosnia- Herzegovina, Slovenia and the former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia for which tariff ceilings were opened by Council Regulation (EC) No 653/94
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 3028/94 of 13 December 1994 re-establishing the levying of customs duties on products of CN codes ex 7304, 7305 and ex 7306 originating in the Republics of Croatia, Bosnia-Herzegovina, Slovenia and the former Yugoslav  Republic of Macedonia for which tariff ceilings were opened by Council Regulation (EC) No 653/94
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: From 17 December 1994, the levying of customs duties suspended for 1994 by Regulation (EC) No 653/94 shall be re-established on imports into the Community of the products shown in the Annex, originating in the Republics of Croatia,  Bosnia-Herzegovina, Slovenia and the former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 December 1994.
For the Commission
Christiane SCRIVENER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 82, 25. 3. 1994, p. 9.
ANNEX
